snippet: The television celebrity Dr. Oz is helping to sell magazines at a time when the industry is struggling to figure out how to appeal to readers.
abstract: Cover appearances by television celebrity Dr Oz are helping to sell women's magazines at a time when the industry is struggling to figure out how to appeal to readers; Oz commands strong loyalty among women aged 25 to 54, a key magazine-buying demographic.
lead_paragraph: The television celebrity Dr. Oz is helping to sell magazines at a time when the industry is struggling to figure out how to appeal to readers.

headline.seo: Dr. Oz, a TV Doctor, Is Driving Huge Magazine Sales
headline.main: Today’s Key to Selling Magazines: A TV Doctor
headline.print_headline: Today’s Key To Selling Magazines: A TV Doctor
